official_title: A bill prohibiting the documentation under the laws of the United States of any vessel beneficially owned by a sovereign nation adjacent to the Persian Gulf.

summary.text: Tanker Anti-Reflagging Act - Prohibits the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating from issuing a certificate of documentation for a vessel which is beneficially owned by a sovereign nation adjacent to the Persian Gulf.

titles.title: A bill prohibiting the documentation under the laws of the United States of any vessel beneficially owned by a sovereign nation adjacent to the Persian Gulf.
